entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: W 29 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
